"Alien's Garden Party": The alien has arrived in your backyard and is ready to host a galactic garden party. Guests are invited to wear their most out-of-this-world attire and enjoy intergalactic cocktails and hors d'oeuvres. The alien will provide a unique and entertaining playlist of space tunes, and there will be a special intergalactic photo booth for guests to capture memories of their otherworldly encounter.

"Alien's Cooking Class": The alien has brought its advanced culinary skills to your backyard, and is ready to teach a cooking class like no other. Guests will learn how to prepare exotic dishes from across the galaxy, using ingredients that are out of this world. The alien will share its knowledge of the culinary traditions of different alien cultures, and guests will get to taste the fruits of their labor at the end of the class.

"Alien's Art Studio": The alien has brought its artistic talents to your backyard, and is ready to create a one-of-a-kind art piece with you. Guests will have the opportunity to collaborate with the alien on a unique piece of art, using a variety of intergalactic materials and techniques. The final product will be a truly out-of-this-world masterpiece that you will treasure for years to come.

"Alien's Yoga Retreat": The alien has brought its advanced yoga techniques to your backyard, and is ready to lead a transformative yoga retreat. Guests will have the opportunity to practice yoga with the alien, who will share its knowledge of the ancient art of space yoga. The retreat will include a series of intergalactic yoga classes, as well as meditation sessions and other relaxing activities.
